function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resistance to adopting new practices such as e-consulting for haircuts","Impact":"Reduction in revenue for salon owners","Mitigation":"Offering incentives or promotions to encourage clients to try e-consulting services","Technologies":"Digital platforms for e-consulting","People":"Salon owners, clients","Owner":"Salon owners"},{"Description":"Difficulty achieving theorization in all service sectors","Impact":"Lack of trust and collective mindset within the ecosystem","Mitigation":"Investing in building social connections and trust, implementing institutional approaches","Technologies":"Social networking platforms, community-building technologies","People":"Service organizations, social actors","Owner":"Service organization managers"},{"Description":"Limited ability for service firms to affect customer demand during a pandemic","Impact":"Inability to boost demand through traditional economic methods","Mitigation":"Implementing institutional approaches to respond to the pandemic, focusing on social connections and trust","Technologies":"Digital platforms for service delivery, social networking platforms","People":"Service firm managers","Owner":"Service firm managers"}]}
